item.description:
This Sunday, several of us will be driving to Middletown, NY, to attend a 3-hour seminar being presented by Jon Mundy, Ph.D., on the section, The Clarification of Terms, from the Manual for Teachers. It should be a very nice introduction to many of the basic concepts in the Course.

He is a well-known teacher of A Course in Miracles. He holds these seminars once a month between presentations that he does all over the world. He has a nice website and is responsible for Miracles Magazine, http://www.miraclesma...

It takes about 2 hours to get to Middletown from my house so we will be leaving at 10:00 to be sure to get there on time and have a chance to have a bite to eat and stretch our legs before the seminar.

If you would like to join us, please call me so we can get an idea of how many are going. Best to try my cell, (860) 338-3922.

Information:

Rev. Jon Mundy. Ph.D.
Minister of the Unitarian Universalist Church, Middletown, New York
PO Box 1000, Washingtonville, NY 10992 , 845-496-9089, www.miraclesmagazine.org

Where:
The Unitarian Universalist Church, 6 Orchard Street, Middletown, NY
When:
1 pm â€“ 4 pm Sunday, November 1, 2009
The Clarification of Terms from the Manuel for Teachers

The suggested donation is $15-20 per session. Contribute whatever you can.
No one is turned away who cannot pay.

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: Jon Mundy Presentation, Middletown, NY
